GSP29snyayvpu:824_2: niṣphalatayā prāmāṇyaṃ nirācaṣṭe. tattvagrāhitayotpannam ity amunā tv evaṃbhūtād
GSP29snyayvpu:824_3: api vākyāc chrotṛdoṣād viparītādyarthagrahaṇacaturatayā prādurbhūtasya śābdatvaṃ

GSP29snyayvpu:1103: tena vaidharmyeṇa dṛṣṭāntaḥ. kīdṛśa ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1105: sa ca sādhanasyāpi gamakasyāpy asambhava evety atra draṣṭavyaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1106: khyāpyate pratipādyate yatra kvacid dṛṣṭānte sa vaidharmyeṇa bhavatītiśabdena sambandhasmaraṇād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1109: asyāpi smaryamāṇe sambandhe prayogāyogād iti kim arthaṃ vismṛtasambandha eva prativādini dṛṣṭāntaḥ prayujyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1112: vyarthā syāt tadasadbhāve 'py evaṃ nyāyavido viduḥ // NA_20 //
GSP29snyayvpu:1113: [NAV_20.1] anyadāhi smaryamāṇe vā sambandhe prayujyetāgṛhīte vā. yady ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1114: so 'yuktaḥ. yadā sarvatra sādhyāvinābhāvinaṃ hetuṃ smarati pratipādyas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1115: tadā pakṣe 'pi tam avabudhya kathaṃ sādhyaṃ na pratipadyeta?
GSP29snyayvpu:1116: tataś cāntaḥ pakṣamadhye vyāptiḥ sādhanasya sādhyākrāntatvam antarvyāptis,
GSP29snyayvpu:1117: tayāiva sādhyasya gamyasya siddheḥ pratīter bahir vivakṣitadharmiṇo 'nyatra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇy udāhṛtir vyāptidarśanarūpā vyarthā niṣprayojanā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1118: tatpratyāyyārthābhāvād iti. dvitīyapakṣasyāpi nirdoṣatāṃ nirasyann āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1119: tadasadbhāve 'py evaṃ sambandhāgrahaṇād antarvyāptyabhāve 'py evam iti vyarthāiva bahirudāhṛtiḥ. na hi sahadarśanāt kvacit sarvatra tadrūpatā sidhyati,
GSP29snyayvpu:1120_0: vyabhicāradarśanāt. tasmād agṛhītasambandhe pratipādye pramāṇena pratibandhaḥ sādhyaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1120_1: tatsiddhau tata eva sādhyasiddher akiñcitkarī dṛṣṭāntodāhṛtir iti nyāyavido nyāyavidvāṃso
GSP29snyayvpu:1120_2: vidur avabudhyanta iti. iha ca prakaraṇe śeṣāvayavānām upanayanigamanaśuddhipañcakalakṣaṇānāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1122: tathāpy ata eva pratipāditāvayavatrayād buddhimadbhir unneyaṃ;
GSP29snyayvpu:1123_0: yato 'vayavāpekṣayā jaghanyamadhyamotkṛṣṭās tisraḥ kathā bhavanti. tatra hetupratipādanamātraṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1123_1: jaghanyā. dvyādyavayavanivedanaṃ madhyamā. sampūrṇadaśāvayavakathanam utkṛṣṭā. tatreha
GSP29snyayvpu:1123_2: madhyamāyāḥ sākṣāt kathanena jaghanyotkṛṣṭe arthataḥ sūcayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:1126_0: [NAV_21.0] evaṃ pakṣādilakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ heyajñāne saty upādeyaṃ viviktataraṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1126_1: vedyata iti tadvyudastāḥ pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntābhāsā vaktavyāḥ. tatra tāvat pakṣalakṣaṇavyudastān pakṣābhāsān āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1129: [NAV_21.1] pakṣasthānopanyastatvāt tatkāryākaraṇatvāc ca pakṣavad ābhāsata iti pakṣābhāsaḥ. asāv anekadhānekaprakāro mata iti sambandhaḥ. katham ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1130: pratipādyasya prativādino yaḥ kaścit siddhaḥ pratītāv ārūḍha eva sa pakṣābhāsaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1133: atiprasakteḥ. tathākṣaliṅgato 'dhyakṣahetubhyāṃ lokasvavacanābhyāṃ ca bādhitas tiraskṛto yaḥ sa pakṣābhāsaḥ. tatra pratipādyasiddho yathā: paudgaliko ghaṭaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1134: saugataṃ vā prati: sarvaṃ kṣaṇikam ityādi. pratyakṣabādhito yathā: niraṃśāni svalakṣaṇāni,
GSP29snyayvpu:1135: parasparaviviktau vā sāmānyaviśeṣāv iti. anumānabādhito yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1140: [NAV_22.0] sāmprataṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ smārayaṃs tadapāstān hetvābhāsān āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1143: [NAV_22.1] hetor lakṣaṇam asādhāraṇadharmarūpaṃ yad īritaṃ gamitam anekārthatvād vā pratipāditaṃ svārthānumānaprastāve yad utānyathānupapannatvam iti tasyāpratītir anadhyavasāyaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1146: 'pratītiś ca sandehaś ca viparyāsaś ceti dvandvaḥ;
GSP29snyayvpu:1149: tadābhatāābhānam ābhā tasyeva samyagghetor ivābhāsyeti tadābhas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1153: [NAV_23.0] adhunā yena lakṣaṇena yannāmā hetvābhāso bhavati tad darśayati:
GSP29snyayvpu:1155: viruddho yo 'nyathāpy atra yukto 'naikāntikaḥ sa tu // NA_23 //
GSP29snyayvpu:1156_0: [NAV_23.1] yaḥ kaścid apratītaḥ pratītyā agocarīkṛto 'niścitaḥ so 'siddhanāmā hetvābhāsaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1156_1: tuśabdas trayasyāpi bhedoddyotakaḥ. yas tv anyathāiva sādhyaṃ vināiva vipakṣa eveti yāvad,
GSP29snyayvpu:1157: upapadyate sambhavati sa viruddhābhidhānaḥ. yaḥ punar anyathāpi sādhyaviparyayeṇāpi yukto ghaṭamānako,
GSP29snyayvpu:1165: [NAV_23.2] tathā hy: anityāikānte tāvad asiddhāḥ sarva eva hetavaś,
GSP29snyayvpu:1170_0: tathāpi teṣāṃ sādhanatve sādhyam api niḥsvabhāvam iti kharaviṣāṇaṃ śaśaviṣāṇasya
GSP29snyayvpu:1170_1: sādhanam āpadyata iti śobhanaḥ sādhyasadhanavyavahāraḥ. sarva evāyam anumānānumeyavyavahāro
GSP29snyayvpu:1172: evaṃ tarhi cākṣuṣatvam api śabde buddhyādhyāropya hetutayocyamānaṃ nāsiddhatayodbhāvanīyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1180: vyavacchedikā vā buddhiḥ svāṃśamagnāpi bahirvastugrahaṇarūpatayā plavamānā?
GSP29snyayvpu:1181: nāparo vastudharmo yatra bhedābhedavikalpadvāreṇā dūṣaṇaṃ ditsur bhavān iti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:1182: tarhi sa śabde nāstīti kāiṣā bhāṣā?
GSP29snyayvpu:1183: evaṃ hi nabhaḥpuṇḍarīkaṃ tatra nāstīti sattvādikam api kalpayituṃ na śakyam iti prasajyeta. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:1184: te sādhanadharmā dharmiṇi bhavanto 'pi na bhavaddarśane pratītim ārohanti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1186: taduttarakālabhāvinyā vāsanāprabodhajanyāyā vikalpabuddheḥ svāṃśagrahaṇaparyavasitaśarīratvena bahiḥsvalakṣaṇe praveśābhāvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1188: [NAV_23.3] nityāikānte 'pi dharmiṇo 'tyantavyatiriktānām apāramārthikānāṃ vā svasādhanadharmāṇāṃ pramāṇenāpratītatvād asiddhatā draṣṭavyā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1189: dharmiṇo 'vinirluṭhitarūpāṇāṃ pāramārthikānāṃ sakaladharmāṇāṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇaprasiddhatvena nihnotum aśakyatvād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1190: [NAV_23.4] tathā viruddhatāpi pakṣadvaye 'pi sarvasādhanadharmāṇām unneyānekāntapratibaddhasvabhāvatvena tatsādhanapravaṇatvāt. etac cottaratra vakṣyāmaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1191: [NAV_23.5] evaṃ pakṣadvaye 'pi nirdiśyamānāḥ sarva eva hetavo 'naikāntikatām ātmasātkurvanti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1194: [NAV_23.6] tathā hi: anityavādī nityavādinaṃ prati pramāṇayati. sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1198: tato 'rthakriyā vyāvartamānā svakroḍīkṛtāṃ sattāṃ vyāvartayed iti kṣaṇikatvasiddhiḥ. na hi nityo 'rtho 'rthakriyāyāṃ krameṇa pravartitum utsahate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1201: atādavasthyasyānityalakṣaṇatvāt. nityo 'pi kramavartinaṃ sahakārikāraṇam artham udīkṣamāṇas tāvad asīt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1202: paścāt tam āsādya krameṇa kāryaṃ kuryād iti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:1205: akiñcitkarasyāpi pratīkṣaṇe 'navasthāprasaṅgāt. nāpi yaugapadyena nityo 'rtho 'rthakriyāṃ kurute,
GSP29snyayvpu:1206: 'dhyakṣavirodhāt. na hy ekakālaṃ sakalāḥ kriyāḥ prārabhamāṇaḥ kaścid upalabhate; karotu vā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1207: tathāpy ādyakṣaṇa eva sakalakriyāparisamāpter dvitīyādikṣaṇeṣv akurvāṇasyānityatā balād āḍhaukate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1210: sarvaṃ nityaṃ sattvāt. kṣaṇike sadasatkālayor arthakriyāvirodhāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1212: tato nivartamānam ananyaśaraṇatayā nityatvaṃ sādhayati. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:1217: sakalabhāvānāṃ parasparaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaprāptyātiprasaṅgāc ca. nāpi dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣodaṃ kṣamate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1218: asataḥ kāryakaraṇaśaktivikalatvāt. anyathā śaśaviṣāṇādayo 'pi kāryakaraṇāyotsaheran, viśeṣābhāvād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1219: [NAV_23.8] tad evam ekāntadvaye 'pi ye ye hetavas te te yukteḥ samānatayā viruddhaṃ na vyabhicaranty;
GSP29snyayvpu:1221: sarvavastudharmāṇāṃ vastuto 'nekāntapratibaddhatvād iti. tasmād amī sarva eva hetavaḥ santo 'nekāntam antareṇa nopapadyanta iti tam eva pratipādayitum īśate;
GSP29snyayvpu:1222: vimūḍhabuddhibhiḥ punaḥ vipakṣasādhanārtham upanyasyamānā vivakṣayāsiddhaviruddhānaikāntikatām ābibhratīti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvpu:1224: [NAV_24.0] tad evaṃ hetvābhāsān pratipādya dṛṣtāntalakṣaṇavyudastān dṛṣṭāntābhāsān āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1227: [NAV_24.1] sādhanaṃ sādhyākrāntam upadarśayitum abhipretaṃ yasmiṃs tat sādharmyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1229: dūṣyanta iti doṣāḥ. dṛṣṭāntā eva doṣā dṛṣṭāntadoṣāḥ dṛṣṭāntābhāsā ity arthaḥ. nyāyavidīritā vidvadbhir gaditāḥ;
GSP29snyayvpu:1232: tadvikalās tacchūnyāḥ. ādiśabdāt sandigdhasādhyasādhanobhayadharmā gṛhyante. kiṃbhūtā ete ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1235: tebhya utthā utthānaṃ yeṣāṃ te 'palakṣaṇahetūtthāḥ; idaṃ ca prāyikaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1242: taducchede ca pramāṇaprameyābhāvān na kiñcit kenacit sādhyata iti bhrāntavādino mūkatāpanipadyeta. sādhanavikalo yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1246: svapnasaṃvedanasya pramāṇatāvaikalyāt tatpratyanīkajāgratpratyayopanipātabādhitatvād iti. ubhayavikalo yathā: nāsti sarvajñaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1249: ghaṭasya sattvāt pratyakṣādibhir upalabdhatvāc ca. sandigdhasādhyadharmo yathā: vītarāgo 'yaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1252: viśiṣṭacetodharmāṇāṃ viśiṣṭavyāhārādiliṅgagamyatvād rathyāpuruṣe tannirṇayasyāpy abhāvād iti. sandigdhasādhanadharmo yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1257: vītarāgasyāpi tathā sambhavād iti. sandigdhobhayadharmo yathāsarvajño 'yaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1260: [NAV_24.3] nanu ca parair anyad api dṛṣṭāntābhāsatrayam uktam,
GSP29snyayvpu:1261: tad yathānanvayo 'pradarśitānvayo viparītānvayaś ceti. tatrānanvayo yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1264: iṣṭapuruṣavad iti. yady api kileṣṭapuruṣe rāgādimattvaṃ vaktṛtvaṃ ca sādhyasādhanadharmau dṛṣṭau,
GSP29snyayvpu:1265: tathāpi yo yo vaktā sa sa rāgādimān iti vyāptyasiddher ananvayo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ. tathāpradarśitānvayo yathānityaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1267: ghaṭavad iti. atra yady api vāstavo 'nvayo 'sti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1268: tathāpi vādinā vacanena na prakāśita ity apradarśitānvayo dṛṣṭāntaḥ. viparitānvayo yathānityaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1269: kṛtakatvād iti hetum abhidhāya yad anityaṃ tad kṛtakaṃ ghaṭavad iti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1272: iha tu viparyāsadarśanād viparītatā. tad etad bhavadbhiḥ kasmān noktam iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1273: [NAV_24.4] atrocyate -- pareṣāṃ na suparyālocitam etad dṛṣṭāntābhāsatrayābhidhānam iti jñāpanārtham. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:1274: na tāvad ananvayo dṛṣṭāntābhāso bhavitum arhati. yadi hi dṛṣṭāntabalena vyāptiḥ sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratipādyeta,
GSP29snyayvpu:1281: pratibandhābhāve cānvayāsiddheḥ. na ca hetudoṣo 'pi dṛṣṭānte vācyo,
GSP29snyayvpu:1282: 'tiprasaṅgād iti. tathāpradarśitānvayaviparītānvayāv api na dṛṣṭāntābhāsatāṃ svīkuruto,
GSP29snyayvpu:1285: vaktṛdoṣāṇāmānantyāt. vaktṛdoṣatve 'pi parārthānumāne tatkauśalam apekṣata iti. evaṃ copanyāse na bubhutsitārthasādhakāv ato dṛṣṭāntābhāsāv etāv iti ced,
GSP29snyayvpu:1286: evaṃ tarhi karaṇāpāṭavādayo 'pi dṛṣṭāntābhāsā vācyāḥ. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:1288: vispaṣṭavarṇāgrahaṇe vyaktatayā tadarthāvagamābhāvād ity āstāṃ tāvat.
GSP29snyayvpu:1290: [NAV_25.0] tad evaṃ sādharmyeṇa dṛṣṭāntābhāsān pratipādya vaidharmyeṇāha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1293: [NAV_25.1] sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāvavyāptau darśayitum abhipreto yasmiṃs tad vaidharmyam,
GSP29snyayvpu:1294: tenātra dṛṣṭāntadoṣā nyāyavidīritā iti dattārtham. sādhyasādhanayugmānāṃ gamyagamakobhayānām anivṛtter anivartanāc,
GSP29snyayvpu:1295: caśabdasya vyavahitaprayogatvāt saṃśayāc ca nivṛttisandehāc cety arthaḥ. tad anena ṣaḍ dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ sūcitās,
GSP29snyayvpu:1303: pramāṇatvād iti. atra vaidharmyadṛṣṭānto: yat punar bhrāntaṃ na bhavati na tat pramāṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1305: svapnajñānād bhrāntatānivṛtteḥ sādhyāvyatirekitvam iti. sādhanāvyatirekī yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1307: pramāṇatvād iti. atra vaidharmyadṛṣṭānto: yat punaḥ savikalpakaṃ na tat pramāṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1308: tad yathānumānam; anumānāt pramāṇatānivṛtteḥ sādhanāvyatirekitvam iti. ubhayāvyatirekī yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1310: sattvād iti. atra vaidharmyadṛṣṭānto: yaḥ punar na nityānityaḥ sa na san,
GSP29snyayvpu:1312: ghaṭād ubhayasyāpy avyāvṛtter ubhayāvyatirekitvam iti. tathā sandigdhasādhyavyatireko yathāsarvajñā anāptā vā kapilādayo,
GSP29snyayvpu:1314: yaḥ punaḥ sarvajña āpto vā 'sāv āryasatyacatuṣṭayaṃ pratyapīpadat,
GSP29snyayvpu:1315_0: tad yathā -- śauddhodanir iti. ayaṃ ca sādhyāvyatirekī vāryasatyacatuṣṭayasya duḥkhasamudayamārganirodhalakṣaṇasya
GSP29snyayvpu:1319_1: kartuṃ śakyatvāt. tasmāc chauddhodaneḥ sakāśād asarvajñatānāptatālakṣaṇasya sādhyasya
GSP29snyayvpu:1319_2: vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdheti sandigdhasādhyavyatirekitvam iti. sandigdhasādhanavyatireko yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1320: 'nādeyavākyaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvād iti. atra vaidharmyadṛṣṭānto:
GSP29snyayvpu:1323: tad yathā -- sugata iti. yady api taddarśanānuraktāntaḥkaraṇāṇāṃ sugatasyādeyavacanatā siddhisaudhamadhyārūḍhā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1325: ataḥ sugatād rāgādimattāvyāvṛttisaṃśayāt sandigdhasādhanavyatirekitvam iti. sandigdhasādhyasādhanavyatireko yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1328: ye punar vītarāgās te karuṇāspadeṣu karuṇāparītacittatayā dattanijamāṃsaśakalās,
GSP29snyayvpu:1329: tad yathā -- bodhisattvā iti. atra sādhyasādhanadharmayor bodhisattvebhyo vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā;
GSP29snyayvpu:1330: tatpratipādakapramāṇavaikalyān na jñāyate kiṃ te rāgādimanta uta vītarāgāḥ;
GSP29snyayvpu:1331: tathānukampyeṣu kiṃ svapiśitakhaṇḍāni dattavanto neti vā. ataḥ sandigdhasādhyasādhanavyatirekitvam iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1332: [NAV_25.3] parair apare 'pi dṛṣṭāntābhāsās trayo 'vimṛśyabhāṣitayā darśitāḥ. tad yathā -- avyatireko,
GSP29snyayvpu:1334: viparītavyatirekaś ceti. te 'smābhir ayuktatvān na darśayitavyāḥ. tathā hy:
GSP29snyayvpu:1337: vaktṛtvād iti. atra vaidharmyaḍṛṣṭānto: yaḥ punar vītarāgo,
GSP29snyayvpu:1339: yathopalakhaṇḍa iti. yady api kilopalakhaṇḍād ubhayaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1340: tathāpi vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddher avyatirekitvam iti. ayuktaś cāyaṃ vaktum,
GSP29snyayvpu:1341: avyatirekitāyā hetudoṣatvāt. yadi hi dṛṣṭāntabalenāiva vyatirekaḥ pratipādyeta,
GSP29snyayvpu:1344: prākpravṛttasambandhagrahaṇapravaṇapramāṇagocarasmaraṇasampādanārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntopādānāt. na hy ekatra yo yadabhāve na dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1345: sa tadabhāve na bhavatīti pratibandhagrāhipramāṇavyatirekeṇa sidhyaty,

GSP29snyayvpu:2268: [NAV_31.3] nanu ca ghaṭādayas tāvad vināśam āviśanto dṛśyante,
GSP29snyayvpu:2270: vinaśvarasvabhāvānāṃ vā. yady ādyaḥ kalpas tad ayuktaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2273: anyathā svabhāvatvāyogāt. athāivaṃbhūta eva tasya svabhāvaḥ svakāraṇabalāyāto yad uta vināśakāraṇam āsādya vinaṅkṣyatīti brūṣe,
GSP29snyayvpu:2274: tathāpi tadvināśakāraṇasannidhānaṃ kiṃ yādṛcchikam uta tatsvabhāvasampādyam eva. yadādyaḥ kalpas,
GSP29snyayvpu:2279: tataś cāsannihitasvavināśakāraṇakadambakaḥ kaścid ghaṭādir na vinaśyed apy,
GSP29snyayvpu:2282: tathā sati paścād api tadbalād vināśahetavaḥ sannidhāsyantīti prathamakṣaṇa eva sannidadhatu,
GSP29snyayvpu:2283: tathāpi kṣaṇikatāivārthasya. svahetor eva niyatakālāt parato 'yaṃ svavināśahetuṃ sannidhāpayiṣyatīty evaṃrūpo jāta iti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:2285: svahetunā kilāsau varṣāt parataḥ svavināśahetusannidhāpanakṣamasvabhāvo vyadhāyi;
GSP29snyayvpu:2286: sa ca tasyotpādakṣaṇād dvitīyakṣaṇe svabhāvo 'sti vā na vā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2288: tathā sati punar varṣaṃ tena sthātavyam,
GSP29snyayvpu:2289: evaṃ yāvad varṣopāntyakṣaṇe 'pi yadi tatsvabhāva evāsau tadāparam api varṣāntaraṃ sthitir āpadyeta,
GSP29snyayvpu:2291: apracyutavarṣasthāyisvabhāvatvād iti. atha dvitīyakṣaṇe nāsti sa svabhāva iti brūṣe,
GSP29snyayvpu:2294: vināśahetur bhāvasya vināśaṃ vyatiriktam avyatiriktaṃ vā kuryāt?
GSP29snyayvpu:2296: tataś ca bhāvas tādavasthyam anubhavet. tatsambandhaḥ kriyata iti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:2297: na sambandhasya tādātmyatadutpattivyatiriktasya pratiṣedhāt. na cānayor anyataraḥ sambandho 'tra samasti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2299: anyahetukasya paścād utpannasya tadutpattivaikalyāt. tan na vyatirikto vināśaḥ kartuṃ yuktaḥ. avyatiriktakaraṇe punas tam eva bhāvaṃ vināśahetuḥ karotīti prāptam,
GSP29snyayvpu:2303: na pralayaḥ. tan nāvinaśvarasvabhāvānāṃ paścāt kathañcid api vināśaḥ kartuṃ śakyo,
GSP29snyayvpu:2304: vinaśvarasvabhāvānāṃ punaḥ svahetubalāyātatvāt prāg api pratikṣaṇabhāvī,
GSP29snyayvpu:2306: svabhāvasya niyatarūpatvāt; tasmāt prāṇity adyāpi pratikṣaṇavilaya iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:2308: kiṃ tu yathā vināśakāraṇāyogāt pratikṣaṇabhāvī vināśo bhavadbhiḥ pratipadyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2309: tathāiva sthityutpattī pratikṣaṇabhāvinyau kiṃ na pratipadyete,
GSP29snyayvpu:2310: taddhetūnām api vicāryamāṇānām ayogāt. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:2311: sthitihetunā tāvat svayam asthirasvabhāvā bhāvāḥ sthāpyeran sthirasvabhāvā vā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2312: na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣodaṃ kṣamate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2316: anyathā svabhāvatāhāneḥ. dvitīyapakṣe punaḥ svayaṃ sthirasvabhāvānāṃ kiṃ sthitihetunā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2320: evaṃ hi bhāvāḥ kṣaṇamātram api na tiṣṭheyuḥ. kṣaṇabhāvinīṣyata eveti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:2321: sā tarhy asthitisvabhāvānāṃ hetuśatair api kartuṃ na pāryata iti brūmaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2322_0: tatsvabhāvatve punar hetuvyāpāranairarthakyāt. ahetukā satī sakalakālaṃ bhavatīti
GSP29snyayvpu:2322_1: datto jalāñjaliḥ pratikṣaṇavilayasya. tathotpādahetur api tatsvabhāvasyotpattiṃ vidadhyād atatsvabhāvasya vā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2323: na tāvad ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ kakṣīkartuṃ yuktaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2324: svayam utpādakasyotpādane vyāpriyamāṇo hi hetuḥ piṣṭaṃ pinaṣṭi,
GSP29snyayvpu:2329: viśeṣābhāvāt; tataś ca na kaścid atyantābhāvaḥ syāt. tad yathā nirhetukatvān nāśaḥ pratikṣaṇabhāvī,
GSP29snyayvpu:2330: tathāiva darśitayukteḥ sthityutpattī apīti trayākrāntaṃ sakalaṃ vastu jātam abhyupagantavyaṃ;
GSP29snyayvpu:2331_0: tathā sati jīvo 'pi jīvatvacaitanyadravyatvādibhiḥ sthemānaṃ ābibhrāṇa eva harṣaviṣādādibhir
GSP29snyayvpu:2331_1: aparāparārthagrahaṇapariṇāmaiś cotpādavyayadharmakaḥ pāramārthikaḥ pramāteti balāt siddhim adhyāste.
GSP29snyayvpu:2332: [NAV_31.5] nanu ca yady utpādavyayasthitīnāṃ nirhetukatvāt sakalakālabhāvitā bhavadbhiḥ sādhyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2333: tadānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇaprasiddhaḥ khalv ayaṃ tatkāraṇakalāpavyāpāraḥ kathaṃ neyaḥ?
GSP29snyayvpu:2334: na cāyam apahnotuṃ śakyaḥ! tathā hi: kulālādikāraṇavrātavyāpāre ghaṭādayaḥ samupalabhyante,
GSP29snyayvpu:2335: tadabhāve ca nopalambhyanta iti tajjanyā ity ucyante. sthitir api vināśakāraṇasannidhānāt prāk tadbalād eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:2336: tathā nāśo 'pi mudgarādisannidhānāsannidhānābhyāṃ sadasattām anubhavaṃs tatkṛtaḥ pratīyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2338: [NAV_31.6] atrocyate -- na vayaṃ sarvathā hetūnāṃ vyāpāraṃ vārayāmaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2339: kiṃ tarhi svayam utpādavyayasthityātmanā vivartamānasya dravyasya hetavas tadviśeṣakaraṇe vyāpāram anubhavanti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2343: kevalaṃ pratītivikalāṃ yuktiṃ yuktivinākṛtāṃ vā pratītiṃ nāṅgīkurmahe,
GSP29snyayvpu:2345: [NAV_31.7] svānyanirbhāsītyanena prāguktasvaparābhāsipramāṇaviśeṣaṇavan mīmāṃsakān parokṣabuddhivādino yogācārāṃś ca jñānamātravādinaḥ pratikṣipati,
GSP29snyayvpu:2350_1: raktatādivyapadeśavad akartur api prakṛtyupadhānavaśāt sukhaduḥkhādibhogavyapadeśo yuktas; tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:2351: prakṛtivikāradarpaṇākārabuddhisaṅkrāntānāṃ sukhaduḥkhādyātmakānām arthānāṃ puruṣaḥ sannidhānamātreṇa bhojako vyapadiśyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2352: “buddhyadhyavasitam arthaṃ puruṣaś cetayata” itivacanād iti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:2357: sphaṭikadṛṣṭānte 'pi japākusumādisannidhānād andhopalādau raktatānāvirbhavantī tatra punar āvirbhavantī tasya tathāvidhaṃ pariṇāmaṃ lakṣayaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:2358: anyathāndhopalavat tatrāpi na prāduḥṣyāt. tan nākriyasya bhoktṛtopapadyata iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:2359: [NAV_31.9] vivṛttimān ityamunā tv ekāntanityam apariṇāminaṃ naiyāyikavaiśeṣikādiprakalpitaṃ pramātāraṃ nirasyati,
GSP29snyayvpu:2364: anyatrānyathānupapannatvāt. na ca vyatirekiṇi jñāne tat samasti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2368: tadātmanāṃ samavāyasya ca vibhutvād ekarūpatvāc ca sarvātmasu kiṃ na samavaiti, viśeṣābhāvāt?
GSP29snyayvpu:2369_0: tathā ca devadattajṭānena yajṭadattādayo 'py arthatattvaṃ buddhyeran. anyac ca vijṭānodayasamaye
GSP29snyayvpu:2369_1: 'pi yādṛśaḥ prāgavasthāyāṃ tādṛśa eva santiṣṭhamānaḥ prāg apramātā paścāt pramāteti
GSP29snyayvpu:2371: [NAV_31.10] paścārddhena punar bhūtavyatirekiṇaṃ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣanirgrāhyaṃ jīvaṃ darśayaṃś cārvākadarśanaṃ tiraskurute,
GSP29snyayvpu:2372: jaḍātmakabhūtāvyatireke hi tadvilakṣaṇabodharūpaharṣaviṣādādivivartānubhavābhāvaprasaṅgāt. nanu ca kāyākārapariṇatāni bhūtāny evātmavyatirekiṇīṃ cetanām utkālayanti;
GSP29snyayvpu:2374: tadabhāve punas teṣv eva nilīyata iti; tadvyatirekānubhave 'pi na paralokayāyijīvasiddhir,
GSP29snyayvpu:2376: dvayaṃ hi tāvad etat saṃyogam anubhavad upalababhyate -- paṭcabhūtātmakaṃ śarīraṃ cetanā ca. tatrāpi śarīraṃ bahirmukhākāreṇa bodhenārtharūpatayā jaḍam anubhūyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2378: 'ta evāvyatirekapakṣaḥ pratibhāsanirākṛtatvān nāśaṅkitaḥ. vyatirekiṇoḥ punaḥ prakāśamānayor yadi bhūtāny eva cetanām utkālayantīti bhavadbhiḥ parikalpyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2379: tadā cetanāiva bhavāntarād utpattisthānamāyātā paṭcabhūtabhrāntijanakaṃ śarīraṃ nirvartayet,
GSP29snyayvpu:2382: tadviyuktaṃ punaḥ kāṣṭhavat tiṣṭhed iti jīvasampādyam eva śarīraṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2385: jīvasya cetanāvataḥ sakarmakatayāparāparabhavabhramaṇāparāparaśarīranirvartanayor upapadyamānatvāt. bhavāntarād āgacchan utpattisthānaṃ jīvo 'dhyakṣeṇa nopalabhyata iti ced,
GSP29snyayvpu:2386: bhūtāny api tarhi kāyākāradhāraṇadvāreṇa cetanām utkālayantīti pratyakṣeṇa nopalakṣyanta iti samāno nyāhaḥ. atha kāyākārapariṇateṣv eva bhūteṣu cetanopalabhyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2388: evaṃ tarhi mṛtāvasthāyāṃ kāyākāram ābibhrāṇeṣv api nopalabdhā,
GSP29snyayvpu:2389: kāyākārapariṇāmo vā kādācitkatayā hetvantarāpekṣītyanyathānupapattivaśād eva tannirvartanakṣamā cetanā bhavāntarāgatajīvasambandhinīti pratipadyāmahe. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:2390: jīvas tāvat karmacaitanyasambandhāc charīranirvartanārthaṃ pravarata iti yuktam evāitad,
GSP29snyayvpu:2391: bhūtāni punaḥ kiṃbhūtāni cetanākaraṇe pravarteran: sacetanāni niścetanāni vā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2392: yady ādyaḥ kalpas, tato vikalpayugalam avatarati: tac caitanyaṃ tebhyo bhinnam abhinnam vā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2394: tadā puruṣaśarīravat tatrāpi bhūtaiḥ saha vartamānam api bhūtavilakṣaṇam ātmakāraṇam anumāpayatīti tadavasthāiva jīvasiddhiḥ. athābhinnaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2397: tatsvarūpavat. nijanijacaitanyāvyatirekīṇi bhūtāni tenāyam adoṣa iti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:2399: tatsampādyapuruṣaśarīre 'pi tajjanyapañcacaitanyaprasaṅgāt. pañcāpi sambhūya bṛhatpuruṣacaitanyaṃ bahavas tilā iva tailaghaṭaṃ janayantīti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:2400: tat tarhi puruṣacaitanyaṃ kiṃ teṣām eva saṃyogo yad vā tadutpādyam, anyad eva?
GSP29snyayvpu:2404: itarathā bahupuruṣacaitanyāni sambhūya bṛhattamacaitanyāntaram ārabheran. atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣas,
GSP29snyayvpu:2405: tatrāpi teṣāṃ kim anvayo 'sti nāsti vā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2410: niranvayotpādasya pramāṇabādhitatvāt. tan na sacetanāni bhūtāni cetanākaraṇe vyāpārabhāñji bhavitum arhanti. nāpi niścetanāni,
GSP29snyayvpu:2412: itarathā sikatādayas tailādikaraṇe vyāpriyeran. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:2413: tatsamudāyamātrasādhyaṃ vā caitanyaṃ syād viśiṣṭatatpariṇāmasādhyaṃ vā. na tāvad ādyā kḷptir,
GSP29snyayvpu:2414: ilājalānalānilanabhastalamīlane 'pi cetanānupalabdheḥ. dvitīyavikḷptau punaḥ kiṃ tad vaiśiṣṭyam iti vācyam. kāyākārapariṇāma iti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:2415: sa tarhi sarvadā kasmān na bhavati?
GSP29snyayvpu:2417: tat tarhi hetvantaraṃ bhavāntarāyātajīvacaitanyam ity anumimīmahe,
GSP29snyayvpu:2421: api tu sa eva tajjanya iti yuktaṃ paśyāmaḥ. na pratyakṣād anyat pramāṇam asti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2423: tena dṛṣṭāny eva bhūtāni tatkāraṇatayā kalpanīyānīti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:2426: tathā ca bhūyāṃsy anumānāni paralokānuyāyijīvasādhakāni pravarteran. tad yathā -- tadaharjātabālakasyādyastanābhilāṣaḥ pūrvābhilāṣapūrvako,
GSP29snyayvpu:2429: tad idam anumānam ādyastanābhilāṣasyābhilāṣāntarapūrvakatvam anumāpayad arthāpattyā paralokayāyijīvamākṣipati,
GSP29snyayvpu:2430: tajjanmany abhilāṣāntarābhāvāt. evam anyad apy udāhāryam ity āstāṃ tāvat.

GSP29snyayvpu:2438: seyam anantaroktasthityā prakīrtiteti saṃsargaḥ. kiṃbhūtety āha: ādiḥ prabhavo,
